GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
x86/sev: Annotate stack change in the #VC handler

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 2679de7d046fc0ee74aafed55b8ec1e13fd63129, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit a13644f3a53de4e95a7bce6459f834e832ea44c5. For more details please see the references link.
